Class millermedeiros.EventDispatcher


Version 0.9 (2010/11/05) Released under the MIT License .

Defined in: Hasher-0.9.8.js.

Class Detail
millermedeiros.EventDispatcher()

EventDispatcher Object, used to allow Custom Objects to dispatch events.


Author: Miller Medeiros .
Method Detail
addEventListener(eType, fn)

Add Event Listener

Parameters:
{string} eType
Event Type.
{Function} fn
Event Handler.
disableEvent(evtTypes)

Disable Event dispatching by type

Parameters:
{...string} evtTypes
Event types that should be disabled (events types that shouldn't be dispatched)
{boolean} dispatchEvent(evt)

Dispatch Event - Call all Handlers Listening to the Event.

Parameters:
{(Object|string)} evt
Custom Event Object (property `type` is required) or String with Event type.
Returns:
{boolean} If Event was successfully dispatched.
enableEvent(evtTypes)

Enable Event dispatching by type

Parameters:
{...string} evtTypes
Event types that should be enabled (events types that should be dispatched)
{boolean} hasEventListener(eType)

Checks if the EventDispatcher has any listeners registered for a specific type of event.

Parameters:
{string} eType
Event Type.
Returns:
{boolean}
removeAllEventListeners(eType)

Removes all Listeners from the EventDispatcher object.

Parameters:
{(string|boolean)} eType
Event type or `true` if want to remove listeners of all event types.
removeEventListener(eType, fn)

Remove Event Listener

Parameters:
{string} eType
Event Type.
{Function} fn
Event Handler.
{boolean} willDispatch(evtType)

Check if Event type is enabled and will be dispatched

Parameters:
{string} evtType
Event type.
Returns:
{boolean} If Event will be dispatched.
